job.title: Senior Software Engineer – C
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Computer Networking
job.description: Job Title: Senior Software Engineer – C<br><br>Location: Milwaukee, WI (Onsite from Day 1)<br><br>Duration: Long Term Contract<br><br><strong><u>Role &amp; Responsibilities<br></u></strong><ul><li> Design, development, testing, debugging and documentation activities for projects.</li><li> Work on projects that require configuration and code customizations in software products.</li><li> Expand existing and create software to meet the changing needs of industry.</li><li> Travel to site during software commissioning phases to ensure that integration testing and site acceptance testing is completed as required</li><li> Provide mentorship and training to software team</li><li> Travel is approximately ~30%<br></li></ul><strong>Technical Knowledge<br></strong><ul><li> In-depth understanding of Software and IT/hardware setup including network configuration</li><li> Experience with C and C++ Programming</li><li> Experience in development of multithreaded applications using C</li><li> Knowledge of interposes communications and thread synchronization</li><li> Knowledge and understanding of Database Design and Programming (Microsoft SQL, Oracle)</li><li> Knowledge and understanding of Windows Server</li><li> General knowledge of Web Services (SOAP, REST), Socket Programming</li><li> Familiarity with Jira and Confluence</li><li> Experience with GitLab, Sub-Version</li><li> General understanding and knowledge of Virtualization (VMWare, etc.)<br></li></ul><strong><u>Education And Skill Requirements<br></u></strong><ul><li> Bachelor's degree in Computer Science / Electronics</li><li> 5+ yrs of software development and/or programming experience</li><li> Knowledge of industrial automation a plus<br></li></ul>You can also apply via: - http://jobd.info/?id=urJRMB<br><br><strong><u>Recruiter Details<br><br></u></strong><strong>Praveen Rao<br><br></strong>(302) 214-0551<br><br>praveen_us@falconsmartit.com<br><br>Find all current job openings at our Career Page<br><br>https://www.falconsmartit.com/FalconCareer.html<br><br>Follow us on LinkedIn for Job Opportunities<br><br>https://www.linkedin.com/company/falconsmartit/
